ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(OR( $Profile.Name = "Markets Ecosystems", $Profile.Name = "CRM Team", $Profile.Name = "System Administrator" )), OR( ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "New"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Internal / External Discussions"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Client Take-On PreWork"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Client Take On"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Accept Client"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Not Accepted Client"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Identify/Create Enquiry"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(Enquiry__r.StageName, "Closed Lost") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are Restricted to add/edit GT Competitor.
